LisaacTM Platform

STD_INPUT

To use the standard input file. As for UNIX, the default standard input is the keyboard.
Inherit/Insert Summary
inherit_input_stream
 
Slot Summary
is_connected
read_character
Read character from stdin
unread_character
last_character
Return last character from stdin
end_of_input
Return TRUE if end of input
read_line_in
Real all character until \n (so read a line)
